data.description: If a girl shows interest, you need to show her mutual interest

messages.text: Very glad that you wrote, your name is Alice, right?
Yeah, sure, I'd love to get to know you better, Alice

data.description: To start dating a girl, you just need to ask her a question

messages.text: Alice, I'd like to get to know you better, what do you think about it??
Alice, hi, I was captivated by your eyes, you look beautiful! I have a desire to chat with you, what do you think about it?
Hi, honey! Can a gentleman like me get your wonderful selfies?
Alice, what topics do you like to chat with men about?
Alice, what's most important to you in a man?
Alice, how do you feel about more explicit dialog with a man?

data.description: Wow, she sure liked you! Now ask her something about her life?

messages.text: Alice, can you tell how you spend your free time?
Alice, I know you do a lot for the society, tell me why?

data.description: I suspect you will be able to afford more after these general questions. In the meantime, answer Alice's question

messages.text: Тут ошибка в сценарии стоит Свой Вариант в ответ на который должно приходить определенное сообщение и фото но это не предусмотрено в боте

data.description: You managed to get her to send you a teasing photo! Need to keep that sexy vibe.

messages.text: Mmm, you look so sexy, if you're trying to make me horny, you're doing a great job
Alice, baby, my day will never be the same, thank you for your teasing gift

data.description: Say something nice back to her or rewind time to your next date with Alice

messages.text: it's mutual, sweetie, Alice!  xo xo
